name: Eggs (C64)
description:
Web: Use numpad cursor keys and numpad-insert as fire button

It's time for the easter bunny to prepare lots of eggs!

Unfortunately the new Eggotron 3000 happens to crack an egg every now and then. It's your job to pick out the broken eggs before they get painted. Move the cursor over one of the broken eggs, and press the button to get rid of it.

This game is an entry for the "The C64 'Cassette 50' Charity Competition" and therefore follows brutal restrictions: Keep all code below $1000.
